properties.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 29 at 2:37PM PST until March 1 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches expected in higher valleys with 4 to 8 inches in the
mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...White Pine County and Southern Lander County and
Southern Eureka County.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 PM PST Sunday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY
